name: Sky Priest
desc: After ally targets are attacked, gain 2 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." After they unleash a Counter, gain 1 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)." When they have 6 "Lightning Sacrifice(s)," "Lightning Sacrifice" is cleared to increase Ultimate DMG dealt by 180% for 2 turn(s) and deals 200% "Blazar" DMG to all enemy targets. This damage is considered as Ultimate DMG.
